text: Bintuni Bay () is the eastward extension or inner bay of Berau Gulf off Bird's Head Peninsula of New Guinea. Administratively it is part of West Papua (region), Indonesia. The bay is wide at its entrance and the land on both sides is marsh."Sector 5: Southwest Coast of Irian Jaya and off-lying Islands" Sailing directions (enroute): New Guinea (Publication 164, 8th edition) Maritime Safety Information Division, National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency, Bethesda, Maryland, ==Notes== Category:Bays of Indonesia Category:Landforms of West Papua (province) Category:Landforms of Western New Guinea
title: Bintuni Bay
